Package org.simplity.tp

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BatchInput  
    BatchOutput  
    ComplexLogicInterface
    interface to be implemented by any class that can be called from a service as a service step.
    ContextInterface
    interface to be implemented by any class that can be called from a service as a service step.
    LogicInterface
    interface to be implemented by any class that can be called from a service as a service step.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    An action inside a service
    AddColumn
    add a column to a data sheet.
    AddMessage
    add a message to the context
    AddRow
    add a row to a data sheet using fields from the context.
    BatchProcessor  
    BatchRowProcessor
    Data structure that keeps meta data about a flat-file
    Block
    abstract action that manages a block of actions
    BlockWorker
    block of actions.
    ComplexLogic
    complex logic that is implemented in a java code.
    CopyRows
    copy rows from a compatible sheet.
    CopyUserId
    set the special value userId that has the logged-in user id.
    CreateSheet
    set rows and columns to a table
    DbAction
    Base class for all action that deal with db
    DropIntoMessageBox
    set message in the message box
    Encryption
    encrypt fields and columns
    ExecuteSp
    execute a stored procedure
    ExecuteSql
    execute a sql
    ExternalService
    base class for all actions that request an external call.
    Filter
    Read a row from a record, and possibly read relevant rows from related records
    FilterToJson
    Read a row from a record, and possibly read relevant rows from related records
    HttpClient
    an external service request using http protocol
    InputFile
    Data structure that keeps meta data about a flat-file
    JmsConsumer  
    JmsProducer  
    JumpTo
    service has actions that are executed in a sequence.
    KeyValueList
    typical list of values for a drop-down.
    LdapAuthenticate  
    LdapLookup  
    Log
    show values of fields/table : meant for debugging
    Logic
    logic that is implemented in a java code
    Loop
    Loop through a set of actions for each row in a data sheet
    OutputFile
    Data structure that keeps meta data about a flat-file
    PickupFromMessageBox
    get message in the message box
    Read
    Read a row from a record, and possibly read relevant rows from related records
    ReadChildren
    Read rows from a record for a given value of its parent key
    ReadWithSql
    Read a row/s from as output of a prepared statement/sql
    RelatedRecord
    convenient class to work with related records as part of record based action.
    RemoveValue
    simply set value for a field
    RenameSheet
    Rename a data sheet.
    ReplaceAttachment
    Save (add/modify/delete) a row from a record, and possibly save relevant rows from related records
    RestClient
    Open an url connection and make a rest call with the configurations
    RowExists
    Check if a row exists in this record for the primary key
    Save
    Save (add/modify/delete) a row from a record, and possibly save relevant rows from related records
    SendMail  
    Service
    Transaction Processing Service
    SetValue
    simply set value for a field
    SqlToJson
    Read a row/s from as output of a prepared statement/sql
    SubService
    Service that is to be executed as a step/action in side another service.
    Suggest
    Get suggestions from the table associated with a record based on the inputs.
    Synchronizer
    spawns its actions into asynch threads and wait for all of them to complete to proceed beyond this block.
